I'm having an issue with the installer, i'm running it as admin, it installs up to 943MB and then starts uninstalling, after that i get error code -5, which says there wasn't enough memory to unpack the .bin, even though i have a lot of free space. I tried relocating the installer and installation folders, but it's a no go, any help?

I ran the installer as admin, it installed up to 943 MB and then started uninstalling; after tar i got error code -5, which said i don't have enough memory to extract the .bin files, but i have lots of free space. I tried relocating the installer and installation files, but nothing changed.

This game will not work for some until the devs release a patch. You will get an error. I got the same thing, apparently the patch is supposed to be out in a week or so. Download, then wait for the patch. That's what I'm doing anyway.
Don't know why it lags so much on 7 though, there are no complex 3D environments to render. My hardware isn't badly outdated and the game runs at full speed only with minimal resolution.
